Ingredients.1: 1 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined

Ingredients.2: 1 (1.12 ounce) package fajita seasoning mix, divided

Ingredients.4: 1  red bell pepper, sliced into thin strips

Ingredients.5: 1  green bell pepper, sliced into thin strips

Ingredients.6: 1  red onion, sliced into thin strips

Directions.1: Preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place shrimp into a bowl and sprinkle 2 teaspoons fajita seasoning over top. Drizzle with 1 tablespoon oil and toss to combine.

Directions.3: Place bell pepper and onion strips into a second bowl and sprinkle remaining seasoning over top. Drizzle with remaining 2 tablespoons oil and stir to combine.

Directions.4: Place vegetables in the basket of the preheated air fryer and cook for 12 minutes, shaking halfway through the cook time. Transfer mixture to a large bowl.

Directions.5: Place shrimp in the basket of the air fryer and cook for 5 minutes. Flip and cook for 3 minutes more.

Directions.6: Divide vegetables among tortillas and top with shrimp.
